abstract: Rajat Gupta, the former head of McKinsey & Company, who was indicted this week, is an example of how inequality causes envy even among the top 1 percent of earners.
snippet: Rajat Gupta, the former head of McKinsey & Company, who was indicted this week, is an example of how inequality causes envy even among the top 1 percent of earners.
lead_paragraph: Rajat Gupta was rich by almost any standard. He just wasn't rich compared with many of the people who surrounded him. He knew it, and he didn't seem to like it.
